name: Lemon Cod with Vegetables
description: Lean, high-protein white fish. Easy and delicious baked together with vegetables.

instructions.instruction: Spread vegetables on a baking sheet, drizzle with olive oil.
Season with salt, pepper, and garlic. Roast for 10 minutes.
Pat cod fillets dry with paper towels.
Season fish with salt, pepper, and lemon juice.
Place fish on top of the vegetables.
Arrange lemon slices on top of the fish.
Roast for another 10-12 minutes. Fish should flake easily with a fork.
Sprinkle with fresh thyme and serve.

tips: Cod is one of the leanest white fish options.
High protein, low calorie - ideal for dieting.
servingSuggestion: Serve with quinoa or brown rice.
variations: Tilapia or halibut can be substituted.
Add capers and olives for a Mediterranean twist.
